bossDialog: (A Salamander seems to have made its nest in this abandoned treasure hoard, and it doesn't look like it wants to share it with you.)
(You feel your enchanted items heating up and vibrating as you approach. You hope the Salamander hasn't damaged the treasure hoard it jealously guards.)
(You narrowly dodge a glob of searing spit as you approach the hissing Salamander. You order your creatures to attack!)

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures gain 10% more {STAT_intelligence} from stat-boosting effects.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures gain 10% more {STAT_intelligence} from stat-boosting effects.
cardBonuses.7: Your creatures gain 10% more {STAT_intelligence} from stat-boosting effects.

master.dialog: Salamanders are proficient spellslingers who can cast spells multiple times in a row. I hope your creatures can handle the heat! Let's fight!
master.name: Jaytir

name: Salamander
